abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that New York State Police conducted internal review in 2007 about search for escaped convict Ralph Phillips in order to prepare for future escapes, such as one for escapees from Clinton Correctional Facility; observes 2006 escape shows how difficult and exhaustive search may be for Richard W Matt and David Sweat.
lead_paragraph: A State Police report on the search for Ralph Phillips, a convict known as Bucky who eluded capture for months in 2006, was prepared with the current situation in mind.

headline.main: Finding Lessons in a Past Escape as Another Manhunt Presses On
